name: Ping (itch) (Brady Johnston)
description:
Ping is based on the Atari Classic, "Pong" and was created for a University task.

Controls:

W and S for Player1(LEFT)

up and down arrows for Player2(RIGHT).

The goal is to hit the ball past you opponent to score points. The first person to 10 points wins. At the end of each game you will be presented with a game over screen. To restart the game, simply press SPACE to reset the level and then ESCAPE to start the new game.
